entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
